channel.title: Comments on: SQL Server Decode/Encode unicode data
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: SQLDenis
item.dc:creator: SQLDenis
item.description: Shital, you will see ? or a square in SSMS/Em but if you paste it into word it will be properly encoded...you need to set the encoding in your web page to properly display it
item.content:encoded: Shital, you will see ? or a square in SSMS/Em but if you paste it into word it will be properly encoded…you need to set the encoding in your web page to properly display it

item.title: By: Shital Desai
item.dc:creator: Shital Desai
item.content:encoded:
Hi,

I want to store phone symbol
http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/2706/index.htm

How to store this phone symbol using SQL server 2005 server side coding (Storedp Procedure), any suggesiton?

I would really appreciate your help.

Regards

Shital

item.title: By: SQLDenis
